name: naxtiles
author: Nax
title: Naxtiles
description:
Lets you make tiles out of your BobAngel metal plates, for when you have an overabundance of bare earth and, say, nickel plates. Ingots used in place of plates for metals without plates. Presently all tiles are functionally identical and includes two metals from Madclowns Processing if you've that installed as well.
 
 Base tile used from Yuoki Railways, tweaked for each metal. 
 
 Fair warning, this mod consumes 25-27 tiles, so you might start hitting limits if bundled with mods like Alien Biomes.
